00027 namespace boost {
00028 namespace xint {
00029 namespace detail {
00030 
00031 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t& data_t::operator<<=(size_t byBits) {
00032     if (byBits == 0) return *this;
00033 
00034     // bits/dchunks is distance to move
00035     size_t dchunks = byBits / bits_per_digit, bits = byBits % bits_per_digit;
00036     size_t anslen = length + dchunks + (bits != 0 ? 1 : 0);
00037     beginmod(anslen);
00038 
00039     // nlen is one greater than top source byte to move
00040     size_t nlen = (std::min)(length, anslen - dchunks - (bits != 0 ? 1 : 0));
00041 
00042     digit_t *dstart = digits();
00043     if (bits != 0 && dchunks + 1 < anslen) {
00044         // Handle both bits and dchunks in one pass
00045         const digit_t *s = dstart + nlen - 1;
00046         digit_t *t = dstart + nlen + dchunks, *te = dstart + max_length();
00047         length = (std::min<size_t>)(t - dstart + 1, max_length());
00048 
00049         while (t >= te && s > dstart) { --t; --s; }
00050         if (t < te) *t-- = *s >> (bits_per_digit - bits); else --t;
00051         while (s > dstart) {
00052             *t = (*s-- << bits);
00053             *t-- |= (*s >> (bits_per_digit - bits));
00054         }
00055         *t-- = (*s << bits);
00056 
00057         while (t >= dstart) *t-- = 0;
00058     } else if (dchunks != 0 && dchunks < anslen) {
00059         length = anslen;
00060         memmove(dstart + dchunks, dstart, sizeof(digit_t) * nlen);
00061         memset(dstart, 0, dchunks * sizeof(digit_t));
00062     } else {
00063         set(0);
00064     }
00065 
00066     endmod();
00067     return *this;
00068 }
00069 
00070 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t& data_t::operator>>=(size_t byBits) {
00071     if (byBits == 0) return *this;
00072 
00073     size_t dchunks = byBits / bits_per_digit, bits = byBits % bits_per_digit,
00074         bits2 = bits_per_digit - bits;
00075 
00076     beginmod();
00077     digit_t *tgt = digits();
00078 
00079     if (dchunks < length) {
00080         if (bits != 0) {
00081             // Handle both bits and dchunks in one pass
00082             const digit_t *s = tgt + dchunks, *se = tgt + length - 1;
00083             digit_t *t = tgt;
00084             while (s != se) {
00085                 *t = (*s++ >> bits);
00086                 *t++ |= (*s << bits2);
00087             }
00088             *t++ = (*s >> bits);
00089             length = (t - tgt);
00090         } else if (dchunks != 0) {
00091             memmove(tgt, tgt + dchunks, sizeof(digit_t) * (length - dchunks));
00092             length -= dchunks;
00093         }
00094     } else set(0);
00095     endmod();
00096     return *this;
00097 }
00098 
00099 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t operator<<(data_t n, size_t bits) {
00100     return (n <<= bits);
00101 }
00102 
00103 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t operator>>(data_t n, size_t bits) {
00104     return (n >>= bits);
00105 }
